head.supplied: 26 November 1864. ¶ Dear Professor, ¶ ¶ I enclose this letter from Hobarton ¶ to show you, that I have delivered your beautiful maps. A small parcel of publications for you has been enclosed in a ca...

div.p: To August Petermann
Sammlung Perthes Archiv, SPA ARCH PGM 328 , Forschungsbibliothek Gotha der Universität Erfurt.
MS annotation by Petermann: 'Erh. 21. Jan. 1865. | A. 25. März —' [Received 21 January 1865. Answered 25 March 1865]. For a published version of this letter, see Voigt (1996), pp. 59-60. 26/11/64.
Theuerer Herr Professor

Ich sende diesen Brief von Hobarton um zu zeigen, dass ich Ihre schönen Karten ablieferte. Ich habe in eine Kiste, die pr Lincolnshire Anfangs dieses Monats versandt wurde u durch Hr Dr Sonder an Hr Professor Roeper in Rostock gelangen wird ein kleines Packet Schriften für Sie eingeschlossen.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Stets freundschaftsvoll

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ihr

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ferd Mueller
Ich werde 2 grössere Bände meiner Werke in den nächsten Wochen schliessen u Ihnen dann zugänglich machen.
Fast hätte ich übersehen Ihnen für die im letzten Monat angelangten prächtigen N. Seeländischen Atlasse zu danken.
Ich habe selbige nach Ihrem Wunsche vertheilt
26 November 1864.
Dear Professor,

I enclose this letter from Hobarton
Hobart, Tas. Letter not found. to show you, that I have delivered your beautiful maps. A small parcel of publications for you has been enclosed in a case, which was dispatched from here by the Lincolnshire at the beginning of this month and will go to Professor Roeper in Rostock via Dr Sonder.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Always in friendship

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: your

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Ferd. Mueller.

Next week I am going to conclude two larger volumes of my works
The 4th volume of the Fragmenta phytographiae Australiae and B65.02.06. and shall then make them available to you.

I almost forgot to thank you for the magnificent New Zealand atlases, which arrived last month.
Hochstetter & Petermann (1863). Petermann had dispatched a parcel with nine copies of this work to M via Sonder on 9 December 1863, with instructions for the distribution of eight of them to various Australian recipients; see A. Petermann to M, 27 April 1864 (in this edition as 64-04-27a).
I have distributed them according to your wish.
